DOC.brief_summary: The long-term objective study protocol develop test culturally sensitive , community-based intervention , ESENCIAL Para Vivir ( Essential Life ) promote weight loss diabetes prevention among overweight obese Latina immigrant . We choose focus Latinas Latinas especially high risk develop diabetes currently Spanish program available area provide education weight management diabetes prevention .
DOC.brief_title: Weight Loss Prevention Latina Immigrants : Advancing Methods Community-Based Intervention Delivery
DOC.detailed_description: The 8-week weight loss program , ESENCIAL Para Vivir ( Essential Life ) , comprise 6 group session 2 individual session deliver bilingiual , bi-cultural Community Health Advisor . All session interactive activity build educative content contain interactive DVD component . We propose innovative approach employ DVD tandem education session deliver Community Health Advisor maximize buy-in participant well provide access community health leader ( medical professional - endocrinologist , internist , nutritionist ) . Participants 19 year age , self-identifying Hispanic woman without diabetes , pregnant give birth within previous six month . The participant recruit Jefferson County community agency organization . Participants recruit screened initial contact sheet ensure meet criterion , consent complete baseline measurement . At completion program , participant repeat measure do baseline , 6 month post program completion .
DOC.criteria: female age 19 year old , foreign bear , selfidentified Latina , history diagnose diabetes , fast blood sugar < 126 mg/dL , overweight obese ( BMI > 25kg/m2 ) . medical condition weight loss contraindicate ; fast glucose > 126 mg/dL , pregnancy , postpartum le 6 month , plan pregnancy end study period .
